title: How long does it take to get your account back?
body:
If you send Riot a ticket with information and prove that its yours, how long does it take to get it back?

Theyve emailing me asking me questions and such but the latest one didnt ask me any question and just said that theyre gonna transfer my ticket to another group for investigation. How long do I have to wait?

replies.body: Yea they got back to me every 10 hrs(: I got my account back xD
